title: Update on Fire themed Diana skin?
body: Diana is to get a Fire themed skin from All Stars. Can a Rioter speak to when we can see it or the progress of it? I actually have a good amount of RP waiting on it :D

replies.body:
Hiya Silvereagle11! 

While I can't give you an ETA for this particular skin, I can say that she is in development, and we're working on her! She wasn't intended to immediately come out after the All Star event. You'll see her a bit later this year.
If you were to tell, is it close to being finished or closer to being Ao Shin's first reveal?
He's [hereeee](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-reveal-aurelion-sol-star-forger).
How badly did you want to say something when he asked just an hour before the reveal
To be honest, I almost just waited. :P
So sion won't be getting any new skins i assume..of course that's how it is.
Not this patch, no. That doesn't mean he's not getting a new skin later this year. He's on the eligible champions list in terms of skins, so it's entirely possible!

shouldnt diana be on this list for regular skins too? she only got one new skin since her release which was in S2. thats only 1 skin in nearly 4 years now.
same for rengar and zyra since rioters often said that "worldchamp skins" and the likes  dont count.

Correct, Worlds skins aren't considered a check mark for a champion, per se. 

The fire-themed Diana skin isn't esports related, so this particular skin will count in terms of 'giving her a skin'.

>so this particular skin will count in terms of 'giving her a skin'.

wait...

wait

so it means that she won't get another skin this year or next year(s)? Syndra,Jinx,Braum,Draven, etc are getting 2 skins per year but Diana will get 1 skin per 4 years? what the hell? ;_; And even worse: if she wouldn't won that voting she wouldn't get anything at all? I swear to God if that Diana skin ends with Diana with some disgusting fullbody armor/bodysuit, ugly helmet and gray/red/blue/purple/glowing skin color then ... welp something bad will happen.
Just make it look cool/badass but without stupid bodysuit or armors... this? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/kfOa5QzA-fire-diana-skin-recipe-riot-please

RIP Blood Moon Diana
RIP Poolparty/Baywatch Diana
RIP Popstar Diana
RIP Eclipse Diana
RIP <insert here all those amazing fanmade skin concepts that would bring RIOT tons of $$$$> 

And I won't be surprised if Leona, Ahri, Sona, Vi, etc will get another skin or skins this year -_-
Nope, it doesn't mean that at all. As you've seen (and mentioned) getting a skin doesn't mean they won't get a skin for another year or more.

I know  I come on here and poke holes in a lot of stuff you guys say, but I like to do it to keep you on your toes....

So, You say this, but at the rate that you have given Diana skins, y'all make it difficult to believe in your guys' process.  The last time she received a skin was God knows when, and you are considering this as a skin, and you are also unsure if said skin will be Legacy or not.  You really should not make it Legacy out of respect for the players who main her.  Same with any champ you give a skin who hasn't received a skin in a super long time.  Otherwise, it's a humongous slap to the face to anyone who mains the champ.  "Oh here you go!  A skin for your champ, finally, after years of waiting, but you only have a limited time to buy it before we 'say fk you it's gone'."  

You guys really need to do a better job of not making it seem like you appeal to your most commonly played champs because they bring in more money.  I know you don't, but it just seems that way.

>  The last time she received a skin was God knows when

January 28, 2014. 

> you are considering this as a skin, and you are also unsure if said skin will be Legacy or not. 

Correct, it is a skin because it is not e-sports themed. While the community decided on the champion who would receive the skin, Diana won't be wearing an esports jersey, or look anything like the World Championship skins. 

I am unable to say if she is legacy or not because that information hasn't been publicly announced, so that would technically go against my NDA in this case.

Aurelion Sol needs double tap q for toxic talon. Doesn't affect anything else, not even other mages in lane, just gives him a little leg on out play potential for those assasin champs. Make it happen.

{{champion:136}} _This is ME we are talking about...._
keeping guessing stuff wtf
omg his kit looks awesome, but i hope it won't have high scalings, because he would be unstoppable with his E. All hail uncle Dragon{{champion:432}}
Haha this is why you're my favourite Katey {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
You'll see Aurelion Sol first.
he will always be ao shin to us </3
yeah its much shorter,  and can't make jokes about his shortened version (like Au. S. witz)

Why are you getting downvoted?

All you said was Aurelion was very witty!
You just added one of those hip "z"s to the end of it to be "rad"!
http://imgur.com/gallery/6CbxaPc
I was sort of maybe not really nor concretely promised a Shenpai skin sometime soon. Any word on that?
Haha, no word on that one. :P
I see it a little bit like Shadowfire Kindred.
Close - similar color scheme! :D
KATEYKHAOS LEAKLAUNCHSKINPLSKATEYKHAOS

Kay.

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YJ_EURc82Ck/Vt9VWt6CbfI/AAAAAAAAMEU/WWO9z4NOW_Y/s1600/skinturn.jpg

Who is this?
Shadow fire Aurelion Sol ?
Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol!

Ashen
A-Shen 
Ao-Shin
dun dun dunnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn
WOW Ao-shin Lord Aurelion Sol confirmed

So if I may ask, Shadowfire takes a more Diablo (though not sure where SF Lamb fits?) feel in art style while I read on the pbe post Ashen Lord takes some East Indian inspirations?

If so, does this mean we may see more fire-themed skins considering there's already the infernal line, scortched earth, shadowfire (kinda), and now maybe ashen? Not complaining, fire is my favourite alchemic element just wondering on if there will ever be solid production lines of more of these skins?

They all have really cool concepts and stand out from each other so just me wanting to see more of them all!
There is definitely room for more fire themed skins! As you've pointed out, we do have a few fire-type themes, but they don't all align in one spot - which is similar to some of the ice-themed skins.

I suppose since AuS has a fire themed skin, we may get the fire syndra skin some of us have been hoping for :3  (I remember some years ago a red saying a fire syndra skin would be unlikely as players would expect a burning effect or something like that?)

Ooh, that could be cool! 

Yeah, there would be some gameplay implications with the orbs, but that doesn't mean her outfit couldn't have some kind of flame or burning aspect to it! :D
The orbs could be concentrated fire, with no burning effect, maybe a little haze of smoke in the center?
That's along the lines of what I was thinking! As long as the orbs don't have flames, it shouldn't be a bother to gameplay!

AL AuS gives me hope, please do try!

Also what're the most common acronyms going around the office for Aurelion Sol?
Skins has been using AS, not sure about other teams.

Ya I was using AS up until a couple days ago while watching Pawnce stream and remembered that AS when he and a couple others mentioned that itès also known as 'attack speed' so I switched to AuS. We should have a community vote or something on what to use haha
Mmm, that's a good point. Let's see if [others have some suggestions](https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/708352714837635072). ^-^

hell fire/devil's son teemo

cold blood/frozen heart fizz

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=s5rIO7rz,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-08T23:16:18.640+0000)
>
> Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol!

Ashen Lady Diana please.. His fire particles are amazing and hers need to look like it!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=s5rIO7rz,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-08T23:16:18.640+0000)
>
> Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol!

Since Diana and Aurelion Sol are connected in lore, "Ashen Lord" is the only skin with that name and there is a Fire themed Diana skin in the works. Will Diana's be similar to this "Ashen Lord" skin?
I can't drop details just yet - you'll have to wait and see!
Is that any reference to "Ashen-Shugar" from the book series Magician, by Raymond E. Feist?
Nope!

Hey babe, nice icon
 ;*
It is on the way... Soon™...
